ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] newbie here
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow Kwasi, you and I been playing about same length of time.  I started in May 2001just after Kunark expansion pack.  I had to buy EQ classic and Ruins of
ygData.messageBody:
Wow Kwasi, you and I been playing about same length of time.  I started in May 2001just after Kunark expansion pack.  I had to buy EQ classic and Ruins of Kunark separately since at that point nothing was offered as a pack.  I have a copy of EverQuest Trilogy around here that has never been opened which I thought about using to start a 3rd account.  But I just cant afford it, what with an EQ2 account, and a WOW account!
 
Anyway....  no newb here I guess!
 
Wulfric
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: eq1967@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, March 01, 2005 7:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] newbie here

I been playing since EQ since Aug of 2001 I think that was not long after Velious came out not sure but on my main account I got every expansion since.  With my other accounts i started out with Trilogy and for my druids account I got Platinum and then each expansion individually
 
Haly
